title: Instructional Design for University Mathematics Faculty: Conceptual Model-Based Learning Design Process (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics education theory and teaching experience
context.additional_context: Application of a conceptual model for instructor competency development, focusing on designing an online short-term course for preservice elementary teachers to develop mathematics teaching methodologies

learning_goals: Participants can design educational objectives and assessment criteria using a conceptual model of mathematics pedagogy.
Participants can develop a lecture structure (scope and sequence) that reflects the learning characteristics of pre-service elementary teachers.
Participants can implement instructional content and communication strategies according to the instructional design process.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
